content:
The chunk defines the `GarbageReport` class, which inherits from `Job` and serves as a framework for detecting and reporting Python garbage collection leaks. This class is part of a larger system designed to analyze memory leaks by examining objects remaining in Python's garbage collector after collection.

class GarbageReport(Job):
    """Detects leaked Python objects (via gc.collect()) and reports on garbage
    items, garbage-to-garbage references, and garbage cycles.
    If you just want to dump the report to the log, use GarbageLogger."""
    notify = directNotify.newCategory("GarbageReport")
